title: Grant Shapps – 2022 Comments on Centrica’s Gas Storage Facility
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Grant Shapps, the Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy, on Twitter on 28 October 2022.
content:
Brilliant news that Centrica PLC’s gas storage site has reopened for this winter, increasing the UK’s gas storage capacity by 50%.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

This additional capacity strengthens UK energy security and means we can stand up to Putin’s manipulation of global gas supplies.
